# QuickStart

```{admonition} This is my admonition
This is my note
```
```{code-block} python
:lineno-start: 10
:emphasize-lines: 1, 3

a = 2
print('my 1st line')
print(f'my {a}nd line')
```
```{admonition} Another Custom Title
:class: note

Maaa! I made it look the same by setting the class.
```
```python
print("And with the triple backticks syntax, you can have syntax highlighting.")
```
